example.parse: (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 吴宗升)) (VP (ADVP (AD 难)) (VP (VV 掩) (NP-OBJ (NN 遗憾)))))

(IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VV 谦怀))) (DEC 的))) (NP (PN 他))) (VP (LCP-LOC (NP (NN 眉宇)) (LC 间)) (VP (VPT (VV 掩) (AD 不) (VV 住)) (NP-OBJ (DNP (PP (P 对) (NP (NP (NP (PN 自)) (NP (NN 家))) (NP (NN 茶叶)))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 信心))))))
